column2: "Na
column3: enuanom
column4: memmpɛ dɛ medze sie hom dɛ hɛn egyanom nyina hyɛɛ mununkum no ase
column5: na hɔn nyina duaa po no mu

column2: "na wonumaa hɔn nyina hyɛɛ Moses mu wɔ mununkum no nye po no mu
column4: "na hɔn nyina dzii sunsum edziban kor no ara bi

column2: "na hɔn nyina noom sunsum nsu kor no ara bi; na wɔnomee fii sunsum botan a ɔkaa hɔn do: na ɔbotan no nye Kraest."
"Naaso hɔn mu piinara Nyankopɔn enyi annsɔ hɔn; na wodwuruuw hɔn sar no do."
"Wɔdze iyinom yɛɛ mfatoho maa hɛn
column3: ama hɛn kɔn aanndɔ ndzebɔn dɛ mbrɛ hɔn kɔn dɔe."

column2: "Na mma hom nnyɛ abosonsɔrfo dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mu binom yɛe
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ

column2: "Eso mma hom mma yɛmmbɔ ndwamambra dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mu binom yɛe
column3: na mpem eduonu ebiasa totɔr da kor."

column2: "Eso mma yɛnnsɔ Kraest  nnhwɛ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mu binom sɔɔ no hwɛe
column6: 6 #10.9 Tsetse akyerɛwfo no binom ka dɛ Ewuradze."

column2: "Eso mma hom nnhwinhwin
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mu binom hwinhwinii

column2: "Na yinom nyina yɛɛ hɔn wɔ mfatoho ntsi
column3: na wɔkyerɛwee dze tuu hɛn a mber no ewiei ato hɛn yi fo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ma nyia ɔdwen dɛ ogyina hɔ no nhwɛ yie mma ɔaannhwe ase."
"Nsɔhwɛ bi nntoo hom dɛ dza nyimpa tum gyina enyim no ara
column3: na Nyankopɔn yɛ ɔnokwafo a ɔremma wɔnnsɔ hom nnhwɛ nnkyɛn dza hom botum egyina ano
column4: na mbom ɔdze ɔkwan bɛka nsɔhwɛ no ho a wɔnam mu fi nsa

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: m'adɔfo

column2: "Mekasa kyerɛ hom dɛ enyansafo: hom mbu dza meka ho atsɛn."
"Nhyira kɔɔpow a yehyira do no
column3: nnyɛ Kraest bɔgyaa nkitahodzi anaa? Paanoo a yebubu no

column2: "Ɔnam dɛ ɔyɛ paanoo kor ntsi
column3: hɛn a yɛdɔɔ so no yɛ nyimpadua kor; na hɛn nyina yedzi paanoo kor no ara bi."

column2: "Hom nhwɛ honam afamu Israel; ana hɔn a wodzi afɔrbɔdze no nye afɔrmbukyia no nndzi nkitaho?"
"Ebɛn asɛm na mereka yi? Dɛ adze a wɔdze abɔ afɔr ama abosom yɛ biribi
column3: anaa dɛ ɔbosom yɛ biribi?"

column2: "Oho
column3: na mbom dɛ dza amanamamfo dze bɔ afɔr no
column5: na nnyɛ Nyankopɔn bi a: na memmpɛ dɛ hom nye mbɔnsam dzi nkitaho."

column2: "Hom runntum nnom Ewuradze kɔɔpow mu nye mbɔnsam kɔɔpow mu; hom runntum nndzidzi Ewuradze pon do na hom nndzidzi mbɔnsam pon so do."
"Ana Ewuradze na yɛrehyɛ no ma ɔatwe nyinkun anaa? Hɛn ho yɛ dzen sen no anaa?"
"Kwan da adze nyina ho
column3: na nnyɛ adze nyina na ɔfata; kwan da adze nyina ho
column4: na nnyɛ adze nyina na ɔma ntowdo."

column2: "Mma obiara nnhwehwɛ nankasa nedze
column3: na mbom ɔnhwehwɛ ne nyɛnko dze."

column2: "Biribiara a wɔtɔn no nangua do no hom ndzi
column3: na mma hom mmbisabisa mu wɔ tsibowa ntsi:"

column2: "na asaase nye no mu adze nyina yɛ Ewuradze dze."
"Sɛ hɔn a wɔnngye nndzi mu bi to nsa frɛ hom edzidzi na hom pɛ dɛ hom kɔ a
column3: dza wɔdze besisi hom enyim nyina hom ndzi
column4: mma hom mmbisabisa mu wɔ hom tsibowa ntsi."

column2: "Na sɛ obi se hom dɛ
column3: Iyi yɛ adze a wɔdze abɔ afɔr ama abosom a

column2: "medɛ tsibowa a
column3: nnyɛ wodze
column4: na onyia no nedze na mekyerɛ; na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na wɔdze obi ne tsibowa bobu m'ahofadzi atsɛn?"

column2: "Na sɛ medze ndaase dzi bi a
column3: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na wɔbɔbɔ me dzin bɔn wɔ dza meda ho ase ntsi?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ hom ridzidzi o
column3: hom ronom o
column5: hom nyɛ ne nyina mma Nyankopɔn enyimnyam."

column2: "Hom nyɛ nyimpa a fintsidua nnyi hɔn mu mma Jewfo nye Griikfo nye Nyankopɔn asɔrmba:"
"dɛ mbrɛ mo so mosɔ nyimpa nyina enyi wɔ adze nyina mu
column3: monnhwehwɛ mankasa me mfaso
column4: na mbom dza ɔyɛ nyimpa pii dze
